content: The last two days were crazy i got crazy drunk, blackout and woke up in not my bed, i really fucking hate it never drinking, never. i think i said too much while being drunk but ignorance is bliss so i didnt ask. i vomited like crazy i lost the how many times but fuck me. also somehow yesterday i added image support and it a buggy mess that doesn't work half of the time and i got a over the counter anxiety pills they work ok but i get super sleepy so... and switch 2 being hot grabago like no physical games??? crazy prices... i aint getting switch 2 until i know of a vulnerability
